title: "What is the significance of tracing a pentagram and creating a fluidic current in a group meditation?"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discussed the visualization exercise where a person moves from the center of a circle to the left, then to the next person, and so on until they return to the center. They also talked about tracing a pentagram and creating a sense of being enclosed in an interweaving of energy lines. In the last part(200 tokens), the author introduces the concept of creating and animating a fluidic current that originates from each person's head and passes through the others. They also discuss the formation of a perfect group with five cones of forces projecting into the etheric space.
